backend/main.mo: Motoko actor providing fixed daily and random quotes plus basic reverse life clock stats using hardcoded values.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text mapping of frontend file paths to short functional summaries for build or documentation use.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining light and dark theme OKLCH tokens and applying base layout variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting meta tags, mounting root element, and registering an auto-updating service worker.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining metadata, theme colors, start URL, display mode, and icons.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling caching, versioned cache invalidation, navigation/network strategies, and update activation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wrapping the dashboard with ThemeProvider set to system default and including global toasts.
frontend/src/components/ChronographTimer: Implements a study timer with start, pause, reset, millisecond display, and persistence, updating study time and showing related progress components.
frontend/src/components/DailyQuote.tsx: Fetches and displays a daily motivational quote with a loading skeleton state.
frontend/src/components/DaysRemaining.ts: Calculates days left until a target date stored in localStorage and updates live, reacting to goal changes.
frontend/src/components/ExecutionScore.t: Displays an execution score tier based on today's logged study hours, with special handling before midday.
frontend/src/components/FailureAlert.tsx: Shows time‑based alerts if the user has zero study hours by 9 PM or missed the previous day.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with attribution and external link.
frontend/src/components/ForwardLifeClock: Displays a dynamic 'life‑clock' showing day of year, date, time units, and yearly progress with animated digit changes.
frontend/src/components/GoalEditor.tsx: Provides a dialog to configure goal name and dates, persists them to localStorage, and triggers updates.
frontend/src/components/NotificationMana: Handles notification permission prompts and sends periodic study reminders based on daily hours.
frontend/src/components/NoZeroDaysIndica: Shows a colored indicator reflecting whether today's study hours are zero or active.
frontend/src/components/PsychologicalTri: Displays remaining days until a goal deadline, updating via localStorage and events.
frontend/src/components/ReverseLifeClock: Shows a countdown to a goal date with animated time units and tracks progress since the start date.
frontend/src/components/StreakDisplay.ts: Displays current and longest study streaks and indicates when a streak is broken.
frontend/src/components/StudyHeatmap.tsx: Renders a weekly heatmap of study hours with tooltips and updates on study session events.
frontend/src/components/StudyProgressBar: Shows a 30‑day bar chart of daily study hours with dynamic bar heights and color coding.
frontend/src/components/StudyTracker.tsx: Empty component file with no implemented logic.
Provides a dialog for selecting light, dark, or system theme using radio options.
frontend/src/components/TimeBasedMessage: Displays a motivational message badge based on the current time of day.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements React Query hooks for fetching a daily quote with caching and fallback, and utilities for managing study session data, streaks, and timer state in localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive light/dark theme CSS variables plus custom utilities and animations for the UI.
frontend/src/lib/studyActivityColors.ts: Exports color constants and helper functions to map study hours to activity levels and corresponding visualization colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard layout combining clocks, quotes, timers, study stats, and theme controls, updating time every second.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state for adding a header settings icon and minimal modal for theme switching, with instant theme application and localStorage persistence. Lists existing features, requirements, and a pending request for the theme selector.
